rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
哮喘治疗与较高的流产率和生育挑战有关奥地利维也纳欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上发表的一项大型研究显示，正在接受哮喘治疗的女性流产的可能性更大，需要生育治疗才能怀孕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Asthma-treatment-linked-to-higher-miscarriage-rates-and-fertility-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Asthma-treatment-linked-to-higher-miscarriage-rates-and-fertility-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f47d4b6-97ef-464c-befa-6de892efc534 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 14:12:00 -0400 Asthma treatment linked to higher miscarriage rates and fertility challenges
临床前血液测试可以预测严重的呼吸系统疾病美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的一个科学团队创建了一种临床前血液测试，以识别最有可能患严重呼吸系统疾病的成年人，包括慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Preclinical-blood-test-could-predict-severe-respiratory-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Preclinical-blood-test-could-predict-severe-respiratory-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71ff073c-2b6b-4ed6-b2e1-e6b500d5392a Tue, 10 Sep 2024 14:08:38 -0400 Preclinical blood test could predict severe respiratory conditions
Sulthiame有望减少阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停症状根据在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上公布的一项临床试验结果，服用磺硫胺（一种目前用于治疗癫痫的药物）的患者的阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停 (OSA) 症状有所减轻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Sulthiame-shows-promise-in-reducing-obstructive-sleep-apnea-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Sulthiame-shows-promise-in-reducing-obstructive-sleep-apnea-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ffb071e-6388-40d2-99a2-440d350c5eec Tue, 10 Sep 2024 14:01:27 -0400 Sulthiame shows promise in reducing obstructive sleep apnea symptoms
含镓的生物活性玻璃有望治疗骨癌生物活性玻璃是一种可以与组织粘合并提高骨骼和牙齿强度的填充材料，它与镓结合可以创造出治疗骨癌的潜在疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Bioactive-glasses-with-gallium-show-promise-for-bone-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Bioactive-glasses-with-gallium-show-promise-for-bone-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a150f71-475a-434b-b8b2-e9a85e72f51b Tue, 10 Sep 2024 13:56:00 -0400 Bioactive glasses with gallium show promise for bone cancer treatment
长期锻炼可以使肥胖者的脂肪储存更健康密歇根大学研究小组的一项新研究表明，长期锻炼的肥胖者比不锻炼的肥胖者拥有更健康的腹部脂肪组织，并且可以更有效地储存脂肪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Long-term-exercise-leads-to-healthier-fat-storage-in-obese-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Long-term-exercise-leads-to-healthier-fat-storage-in-obese-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=980ebc5e-0b02-49b8-9747-cfc048fd4299 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 13:48:09 -0400 Long-term exercise leads to healthier fat storage in obese individuals
纽约大学朗格健康中心进行创新型机器人肺移植纽约大学兰格尼健康中心的外科医生进行了美国首例全机器人肺移植手术。该手术标志着外科创新和患者护理的新里程碑，使纽约大学朗格尼分校成为世界上第三个在肺移植手术中使用机器人系统的项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Innovative-robotic-lung-transplant-performed-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Innovative-robotic-lung-transplant-performed-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e01de4d-97a3-4139-9211-c2f6bf749177 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 13:32:27 -0400 Innovative robotic lung transplant performed at NYU Langone Health
基于雌激素的激素疗法对心脏病风险具有有利的长期影响最近的研究表明，女性经历烦人的更年期症状（如潮热）的时间可能比最初估计的要长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Estrogen-based-hormone-therapies-have-favorable-long-term-effects-on-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Estrogen-based-hormone-therapies-have-favorable-long-term-effects-on-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec02598c-57e8-4229-8a8f-7f6dc686dec3 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 13:26:39 -0400 Estrogen-based hormone therapies have favorable long-term effects on heart disease risk
接触内分泌干扰化学物质的女孩可能更有可能提前进入青春期根据内分泌学会旗舰基础科学期刊《内分泌学》发表的最新研究，接触某些内分泌干扰化学物质 (EDC) 的女孩可能更有可能提前进入青春期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Girls-expose-to-endocrine-disrupting-chemicals-may-be-more-likely-to-start-puberty-early.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Girls-expose-to-endocrine-disrupting-chemicals-may-be-more-likely-to-start-puberty-early.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db8df1ad-992a-4034-8c5f-ce5d2cfc1ad0 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 13:23:56 -0400 Girls exposed to endocrine-disrupting chemicals may be more likely to start puberty early
夜间潮热的时间可能会影响心脏病风险无论夜间潮热何时发生，都会造成破坏。一项新的研究表明，在后半夜，通常会发生更多的快速眼动睡眠，并且这种干扰更有可能增加心脏病的风险，因此潮热会发生更多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Timing-of-nocturnal-hot-flashes-may-impact-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Timing-of-nocturnal-hot-flashes-may-impact-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b7209c4-a1fb-4033-869f-64c3b2b64e12 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 12:45:41 -0400 Timing of nocturnal hot flashes may impact heart disease risk
不良妊娠结局可能会增加绝经后妇女的心血管风险与怀孕相关的高血压已被证明会在以后的生活中导致许多负面的健康后果，包括更令人烦恼的更年期症状，如潮热、痴呆、肾脏问题和中风的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Adverse-pregnancy-outcomes-may-increase-cardiovian-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Adverse-pregnancy-outcomes-may-increase-cardiovian-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=900a04ea-38a5-4e37-89d9-5df62a1d4e1b Tue, 10 Sep 2024 12:28:11 -0400 Adverse pregnancy outcomes may increase cardiovascular risk in postmenopausal women
